ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Atmospheric ozone observation with millimeter-wave spectral radiometer at Rikubetsu, Japan
ResourceHeader.Description: Atmospheric vertical ozone profiles from 21 to 65 km retrived from continuous ground-based millimeter-wave (110 GHz) measurements at Rikubetsu, Japan. Further details of the instrument were described in Nagahama et al. (2007) (doi:10.2151/jmsj.85.495), and those of the data processing and error analysis appear in Ohyama et al. (in preparation).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The millimeter-wave spectral radiometer at the Rikubetsu observatory is operated by ISEE, Nagoya University, Japan. For data use, please contact the PI (Akira Mizuno at mizuno [at] isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) for the details. We thank the support staffs of ISEE/GRC for their efforts.
